chat_history.message:
Hello, 
My product iPhone 13 Pro has the above problem: 
I was actually looking forward to the fast shipping. Since UPS didn't show up at 11:45 am, delivery will only happen on May 21st now. Except for the time delay, the same game will repeat itself. I don't intend to become a slave to the service provider.
I generally refuse delivery through UPS. Please let me know immediately what the next procedure is. THE DEVICE HAS ALREADY BEEN PAID FOR!
Thank you very much for your help,

Dear ecomobile

The customer has not yet received the delivery.

Could you please contact the supplier and ask where the package went.

Regards,
Ercan from the Back Care Team

Dear Backcare,

UPS mentioned that they will re-attempt to deliver the package on 21 May between 8:45 to 12:45, the tracking link is:
https://www.ups.com/track?loc=de_de&requester=QUIC&tracknum=1ZBF1560D901090281/trackdetails

Do let me know if there is still any issues regarding this. Thank you.

Regards,
CH
